text:
@SenSchumer Your state accounts for 32% of COVID-19 deaths in the whole country?

New York w/pop. of 19,453,561 leads with 27,755 deaths.
Texas w/pop. 28,995,881, w/1,300 deaths. 

NY=32% of US cases.

Why is that @SenSchumer ?
